suppress.notes: CVE-2024-10491 is a false positive for Express.js. This CVE affects a different component, not the Express.js framework. Reference: https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/7266 Express.js 4.21.2 and 5.1.0 are not affected by this vulnerability. The vulnerability scanner incorrectly flagged Express.js due to component name confusion.
